question: Will the Coalition win by 30 or more seats?
description:
The 2025 Australian federal election will be held on Saturday 3 May 2025 to elect members of the 48th Parliament of Australia.

This market will resolve according to the difference in the number of seats controlled in the Australian House of Representatives between the first and second place parties as a result of the next Australian general election (e.g. Labour control 80, Coalition controls 50, difference = 30).

If neither the Labour party nor the Coalition win the most seats, this market will resolve to "Other".

This market will resolve based on the result of the election as indicated by a consensus of credible reporting. If there is ambiguity, this market will resolve based solely on the official results as reported by the Australian government, specifically the Australian Electoral Commission (AEC) (https://www.aec.gov.au/).

question: Chicago Cubs vs. San Diego Padres
description:
In the upcoming MLB game, scheduled for April 16 at 4:10PM ET:
If the Chicago Cubs win, the market will resolve to “Chicago Cubs”.
If the San Diego Padres win, the market will resolve to “San Diego Padres”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will Team Vitality win the Intel Extreme Masters Melbourne Tournament?
description:
This market will resolve according to the winner of the 2025 Intel Extreme Masters Melbourne Tournament.

If this tournament is postponed after May 28, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, canceled, or a winner has not been declared, this market will resolve to “Other”.

If multiple teams are declared winner, this market will resolve in favor of the team whose listed team name comes first alphabetically.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the Intel Extreme Masters (https://pro.eslgaming.com/tour/cs/melbourne/).

question: NHL Playoffs: Stars vs. Avalanche (To Advance)
description:
This market refers to the 2025 NHL Western Conference Playoffs First Round matchup between the Dallas Stars and Colorado Avalanche.

If the Dallas Stars advance to the next round of the Western Conference Playoffs, this market will resolve to “Stars.”

If the Colorado Avalanche advance to the next round of the Western Conference Playoffs, this market will resolve to “Avalanche.”

If the series is canceled or postponed beyond May 20, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the NBA.

question: Bitcoin Up or Down on April 17?
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for BTCUSDT 16 Apr '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is lower than the final "Close" price for the 17 Apr '25 12:00 ET candle.
This market will resolve to "Down" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for BTCUSDT 16 Apr '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is higher than the final "Close" price for the 17 Apr '25 12:00 ET candle.
If the final "Close" price for both of these candles is exactly equal on Binance, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTCUSDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with “1m” and “Candles” selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTCUSDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Will Xi Jinping talk to Trump before May?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald Trump and Xi Jinping speak directly to one another between April 15, 1:00 PM ET, and April 30, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Any conversation that occurs directly between Donald Trump and Xi Jinping will qualify, regardless of whether it is over the phone, videocall, or in person. The conversation must be voice-based, not text-based.

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from the governments of China and the United States, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Will The Greens win the Seat of Brisbane in the 2025 Australian Election?
description:
Australian Federal Elections are scheduled to take place on May 3, 2025. The Seat of Brisbane will be up for contest in this election.

This market will resolve to the party which the individual who wins the next election for the Seat of Brisbane belongs to.

If the result of this election isn't known by December 31, 2026, 11:59 PM ET, the market group will resolve to "Other".

Any interim/caretaker holder of the seat will not count toward the resolution of this market.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the Government of Australia, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: OpenAI social app in 2025?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if a social iOS app owned by OpenAI is available for installation on the US iOS app store by December 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

Pre-Order does not satisfy the market conditions.

A "social app" refers to an iOS application whose primary function is facilitating social interaction between users, such as messaging, content sharing, or community engagement.

The primary resolution source will be the US iOS app store, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.
